about_the_game: The puzzle images included in this game feature nudity and sexual content, which may not be appropriate for all viewers. Please be advised that all characters depicted in the game are confirmed to be 21 years of age or older. We recommend avoiding this content in professional or workplace settings.

detailed_description: The puzzle images included in this game feature nudity and sexual content, which may not be appropriate for all viewers. name: HAPPY girls - Free 18+ DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything with DirectX 10.0
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Happy girls are just waiting for you to arrange them and completely relax
